thread.title: Man Utd transfer news: Jose Mourinho preparing bid for Milan Badelj at Fiorentina | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd transfer news: Jose Mourinho preparing bid for Milan Badelj at Fiorentina | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd transfer news: Jose Mourinho preparing bid for Milan Badelj at Fiorentina | Metro News
text:
Manchester United ready summer bid for Fiorentina midfielder Milan Badelj gossip Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 12:20 pm Milan Badelj is open to a move to the Premier League (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United are preparing a bid for Fiorentina star Milan Badelj after Jose Mourinho received glowing scout reports about the midfielder, according to reports in Italy. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
Mourinho sent eyes to watch Badelj in the 4-0 defeat to Roma on February 7 and despite the heavy loss, United’s scouts were impressed with Badelj. 
United are looking for a deep-sitting playmaker to take over from Michael Carrick who is nearing the end of his Old Trafford career after over ten years at the club. Manchester United fixtures 
St-Etienne – Europa (H) Thu 16 Feb Blackburn – FA Cup (A) – Sat 18 Feb St-Etienne – Europa (A) – Wed 22 Feb Southampton – EFL (N) – Sun 26 Feb Bournemouth (H) – Sat 4 Mar Southampton (A) – Sun 12 Mar Middlesbrough (A) – Sun 19 Mar West Brom (H) – Sat 1 Apr Badelj is a Croatia international (Picture: Getty) 
Firenze Viola claim Mourinho has been encouraged by scouting reports on Badelj and is considering a bid for the 27-year-old in the summer. 
Fiorentina are reportedly willing sellers and Badelj’s agent recently confirmed his player is open to a move to the Premier League. 
‘The Premier League is always attractive, for all the players in the world,’ Dejan Joksimovic told the Daily Express. Jose Mourinho wants to find a replacement for Michael Carrick (Picture: Getty)
